findings.title: ERC20.name() Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The ERC20.name() function should be declared as external to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: symbol() Function Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The ERC20.symbol() function should be declared as an external function to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: ERC20.decimals() Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The decimals function of ERC20 contract should be declared as external to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: ERC20.totalSupply() Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The totalSupply function in ERC20 contract should be declared as external for optimization purposes.

findings.title: ERC20.balanceOf(address) Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The ERC20.balanceOf(address) function should be declared as external to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The ERC20.transfer function with parameters address and uint256 should be declared as an external function.

findings.title: ERC20.allowance(address,address) Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The ERC20.allowance function with parameters address and address should be declared as external for optimization purposes.

findings.title: ERC20.approve(address,uint256) should be declared external
findings.description: The approve function in ERC20 contract should be declared as an external function for optimization purposes.

findings.title: ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) Should Be Declared External
findings.description: The ERC20.transferFrom function with parameters address, address, and uint256 should be declared as an external function for optimization purposes.
